name: Stagnated In Slumber
description:
Wake up, go to sleep. That is all you have to do.

Stagnated In Slumber is a short RPG Maker game about a meaningless life of a meaningless character. Play as Agnes, a girl stuck at home, sleeping through day after day. Explore around the house and, if you are lucky, find something interesting to do.

  • 3+ endings.
  • 30-40 minutes of gameplay.
  • 10 in-game days to play through.
  • Windows only (Hopefully this will change).

This game contains:

  • Gore
  • Medication Abuse
  • Violence
  • Flashing Lights

If you have problems dealing with items above, we recommend that you avoid this game. If you wish to persist, be warned. 

If you encountered a bug, report it to @gradientkey on Twitter via DMs, or email stagnatedinslumber.bugreport@gmail.com.
